name: Tiziani Whitmyre
description: Tiziani Whitmyre Inc. is a marketing agency specializing in revenue generation and brand development for B2B and life sciences companies serving worldwide markets. Our services include public relations and social, content marketing, advertising, creative, graphic design, media and interactive marketing. Our client base has grown to include global leaders in biotechnology, therapeutics, medical devices, manufacturing, automation, financial, professional services, and high technology.
